TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EvaluationContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，表示已经过评估的授权策略的结果。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents the results of the authorization policies that have been evaluated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 声明由授权策略添加到 中。Claims are added to an by authorization policies. 授权策略获取一个声明集（如在安全令牌中找到的声明）并根据当前声明集添加其他声明。An authorization policy takes a set of claims, such as those found in a security token, and adds additional claims based on the current set. 例如，授权策略可评估包含出生日期的声明，添加断言用户超过 21 岁的声明以及将 Over21 声明添加到 中。For instance, an authorization policy might evaluate a claim that contains the date of birth and add a claim that states the user is over 21 years old and add an Over21 claim to the . 实现 接口的类不对用户进行授权，但它们可令 类来执行此操作。Classes that implement the interface do not authorize users, but they enable the class to do so. 为每个有效授权策略调用 方法。The calls the method for each authorization policy in effect. 方法根据当前声明确定是否应为用户添加其他声明。The method determines whether additional claims should be added for the user based on the current claims. 当声明由其他授权策略添加到 时，可多次调用授权策略的 方法。An authorization policy's method may be called multiple times, as claims are added to the by other authorization policies. 当所有有效授权策略都已完成时， 类会根据最终的声明集做出授权决定。When all authorization policies in effect are done, the class makes authorization decisions based upon the final set of claims. 然后， 类会创建一个 ，其中包含反映这些授权决定的不可变声明集。The class then creates an that contains an immutable set of claims that reflects these authorization decisions. 评估上下文包含一组 对象：一个过期时间（指定评估上下文的有效期）和一个唯一标识符。An evaluation context contains a set of objects: an expiration time, which specifies the span of time during which the evaluation context is valid, and a unique identifier.

Protected Sub New ()
protected: EvaluationContext();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void AddClaimSet (System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy policy, System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet claimSet);

public: abstract void AddClaimSet(System::IdentityModel::Policy::IAuthorizationPolicy ^ policy, System::IdentityModel::Claims::ClaimSet ^ claimSet);
public abstract void AddClaimSet (System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy authorizationPolicy, System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet claimSet);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddClaimSet(class System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy authorizationPolicy, class System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet claimSet) cil managed
public: abstract void AddClaimSet(System::IdentityModel::Policy::IAuthorizationPolicy ^ authorizationPolicy, System::IdentityModel::Claims::ClaimSet ^ claimSet);

param.name: claimSet
param.span: 一个包含一个声明集的 。

span.span: A that contains a set of claims.

summary.span: 将一个声明集添加到评估上下文中。

span.span: Adds a set of claims to the evaluation context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 声明被添加到包含在 属性中的声明集中。The claims are added to the set of claims contained within the property. 每次调用 方法向评估上下文中添加声明时， 属性都会递增。Each time the method is called to add claims to the evaluation context, the property should be incremented.

Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ClaimSets As ReadOnlyCollection(Of ClaimSet)

public: abstract property System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::IdentityModel::Claims::ClaimSet ^> ^ ClaimSets { System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::IdentityModel::Claims::ClaimSet ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 对象的只读集合，该集合包含由已经过评估的授权策略添加的声明。

span.span: Gets a read-only collection of objects that contains the claims added by authorization policies that have been evaluated.

value.span: 一个 对象，它包含由已经过评估的授权策略添加的声明。

span.span: A objects that contains the claims added by authorization policies that have been evaluated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，若要将声明从授权策略添加到此集合中，请使用 方法。To add claims to this collection, for example from an authorization policy, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract int Generation { get; }
.property instance int32 Generation
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Generation As Integer
public: abstract property int Generation { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取已向评估上下文中添加声明的次数。

span.span: Gets the number of times that claims have been added to the evaluation context.

value.span: 已向评估上下文中添加声明的次数。

span.span: The number of times that claims have been added to the evaluation context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用 属性确定是否需要执行下一轮评估。The class uses the property to determine if another evaluation round is required. 授权策略每次调用 `AddToTarget` 方法向评估上下文中添加声明时， 属性都会递增。Each time an authorization policy calls the `AddToTarget` method to add claims to the evaluation context, the property is incremented. 当再次对所有授权策略调用 方法后， 类会检查 属性。The class examines the property after calling the method on all authorization policies again. 如果 属性在评估期间已递增，则对于上次对其调用 方法时返回 的任何授权策略，`false` 类会再次对该授权策略调用 方法。If the property has been incremented during evaluation, the class calls the method on any authorization policies that returned `false` the last time the method was called on that authorization policy.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,object> Properties { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object> Properties
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Properties As IDictionary(Of String, Object)

public: abstract property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ Properties { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与此 关联的非声明属性的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of non-claim properties associated with this .

value.span: 一个指定非声明属性集合的 。

span.span: A that specifies a collection of non-claim properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的类命名空间中实现接口 （授权策略） 将添加名为的属性`Identities`到。The classes in the namespace that implement the interface (authorization policies) add a property named `Identities` to the. 集合。collection. `Identities` 属性包含类型为 的对象，该对象包含一个或多个 实例，这些实例代表由授权策略提供的标识信息。The `Identities` property contains an object of type that contains one or more instances that represent identity information that is provided by the authorization policies.

summary.span: 设置此 不再有效的日期和时间。

span.span: Sets the date and time at which this is no longer valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在 参数的值早于上述指定值时，多次调用 `expirationTime` 方法才会起作用。Calling the method multiple times only has an effect if the `expirationTime` parameter has a value that is earlier than the previously specified value.
